name: Cherrywitched!
summary: In Cherrywitched! You play as a witch detective for the Council of Witches who’s been struggling with a recent series of missing person cases. One day, you decide to take a break from work to visit your favorite cafe: Cherry Pie’s Cafe! This game takes place in the same universe as my first visual novel Berrywitched! So if you haven't played that game, please consider checking it out.
